Message: With a single wave of her hand,

the rabid dog scurried away
with its tail between its legs.
But, my eyes had deceived me.

she had used incense that
dogs hate the smell of
to get rid of it.
She wasn’t a witch at all—

just a simple scholar who
started living in the woods
because she hated how noisy
town life was.

After that, the two of us
started getting to know
one another.

I really liked talking to her,
even if she was a bit strange.

That girl...was captured
by the Knights of Longinus.
